title: Halden's Gamble Unleashed
outcome: A countdown triggers Halden’s last experiment: radical volunteerism. BCI suspends all assignments for two weeks, forcing citizens to self-organize. Different districts rise or fall, confronting the stark realities of life without algorithmic order.

events.description: A citywide alert announces all BCI assignments are suspended for two weeks. Citizens are instructed to organize work and services in their own neighborhoods.
Some districts stabilize rapidly as local leaders step up, organizing food and medical care. Other areas are thrown into chaos with power struggles, hoarding, and mistrust rising.
Council debates whether to intervene as rival districts request emergency guidance. Innovators promote documenting successes for a new city charter; Directorate urges strong reimposition of order.
Grassroots councils in several neighborhoods publicly announce new codes of conduct, defying BCI scoring. Others beg for the return of system assignments to restore predictability.
A citywide assembly is called. People gather to decide, through open vote, whether to re-activate BCI, reform it, or let voluntary order evolve. Stenograd faces an uncertain, self-determined future.
